concept.title: Many ditamaps for same content repository

conbody.p: Topic-level content reuse is simple to understand.
A ditamap is an ingredient list of a collection. More than one ditamap can reference the same topic.

So if you have a repository of DITA content topics covering how to use a range of cameras from the same manufacturer, we could create a ditamap for the Model 400 User Guide, another ditamap for the Model 700 User Guide, and another for the Model 700 Administrator's Guide. Some topics might be common to all ditamaps, while others might be unique to one.
